mapper.select: SELECT "orderId","orderName","orderAddress", "productModel","productName","orderCount", "orderPrice","orderDate","orderState" FROM ( SELECT "orderId","orderName","orderAddress", "productModel","productName","orderCount", "orderPrice","orderDate","orderState", ROWNUM AS rnum FROM ( SELECT o.order_id AS "orderId", o.order_name AS "orderName", o.order_address AS "orderAddress", p.product_model AS "productModel", p.product_name AS "productName", od.order_count AS "orderCount", o.order_price AS "orderPrice", o.order_date AS "orderDate", o.order_state AS "orderState" FROM orders o LEFT JOIN order_detail od ON o.order_id = od.order_id LEFT JOIN product p ON p.product_id = od.product_id ORDER BY o.order_id DESC ) ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
select count(order_id) from orders where order_state = 0
select count(order_id) from orders where order_state = 1

SELECT "orderId","orderName","orderAddress", "productModel","productName","orderCount", "orderPrice","orderDate","orderState" FROM ( SELECT "orderId","orderName","orderAddress", "productModel","productName","orderCount", "orderPrice","orderDate","orderState", ROWNUM AS rnum FROM ( SELECT o.order_id AS "orderId", o.order_name AS "orderName", o.order_address AS "orderAddress", p.product_model AS "productModel", p.product_name AS "productName", od.order_count AS "orderCount", o.order_price AS "orderPrice", o.order_date AS "orderDate", o.order_state AS "orderState" FROM orders o LEFT JOIN order_detail od ON o.order_id = od.order_id LEFT JOIN product p ON p.product_id = od.product_id WHERE (UPPER(o.order_name) LIKE UPPER('%' || #{keyword} || '%') OR UPPER(p.product_model) LIKE UPPER('%' || #{keyword} || '%')) AND (#{orderState} IS NULL OR o.order_state = #{orderState}) AND (#{orderDate} IS NULL OR o.order_date = TO_DATE(#{orderDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) ) ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT order_id FROM staff WHERE staff_id = #{staffId}
SELECT order_id FROM orders WHERE order_id = #{orderId}

SELECT o.order_id as "orderId", o.order_name as "orderName", o.order_address as "orderAddress", o.order_content as "orderContent", o.order_price as "orderPrice", o.rental_price as "rentalPrice", o.order_date as "orderDate", o.request_date as "requestDate", od.start_date as "startDate", od.end_date as "endDate", od.order_count as "orderCount", p.product_model as "productModel", p.product_name as "productName", c.contract_year as "contractYear", c.contract_price as "contractPrice", u.user_phone as "userPhone" FROM orders o INNER JOIN order_detail od ON o.order_id = od.order_id INNER JOIN product p ON od.product_id = p.product_id INNER JOIN contract c ON od.contract_id = c.contract_id INNER JOIN users u ON u.user_id = o.user_id WHERE o.order_id = #{orderId}

SELECT u.user_email AS "userEmail", u.user_phone AS "userPhone", u.user_id AS "userId", u.user_name AS "userName", u.user_address AS "userAddress", s.staff_id AS "staffId", s.work_place AS "workPlace", s.work_status AS "workStatus", a.authority_name AS "authorityName" FROM users u JOIN staff s ON u.user_id = s.user_id JOIN user_authority a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE a.authority_name IN ('ROLE_CODI') AND s.work_status = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE staff SET work_status = CASE WHEN work_status = 0 THEN 1 WHEN work_status = 1 THEN 0 END WHERE staff_id = #{staffId}
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_email AS "userEmail", u.user_phone AS "userPhone", u.user_id AS "userId", u.user_name AS "userName", u.user_address AS "userAddress", s.staff_id AS "staffId", s.work_place AS "workPlace", s.work_status AS "workStatus", a.authority_name AS "authorityName" FROM users u JOIN staff s ON u.user_id = s.user_id JOIN user_authority a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE a.authority_name IN ('ROLE_DRIVER') AND s.work_status = 0

SELECT s.schedule_id AS "scheduleId", s.visit_date AS "visitDate", s.visit_cycle AS "visitCycle", s.visit_type AS "visitType", s.visit_state AS "visitState", s.staff_id AS "staffId", s.user_id AS "userId", s.order_id AS "orderId", f.work_place AS "workPlace", f.work_status AS "workStatus", u.user_name AS "userName", ua.authority_name AS "authorityName" FROM schedule s INNER JOIN staff f ON f.staff_id = s.staff_id INNER JOIN users u ON u.user_id = f.user_id LEFT JOIN user_authority ua ON ua.user_id = u.user_id AND (ua.authority_name = 'ROLE_CODI' OR ua.authority_name = 'ROLE_DRIVER') WHERE s.order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.delete: delete from schedule where order_id = #{orderId} and staff_id =#{staffId}
